Phone-Country Widget

Hooking up the intl-tel-input functionality to the country drop-down select.

  • Country drop-down is populated using intl-tel-input country object values.
  • Changes to country drop-down will change applied dialing code in the tel field.
<form role="form">
  <div class="form-group arrange arrange-equal arrange-gutter">
    <div class="form-group form-group-required arrange-fit">
      <label class="control-label" for="signupCountry">Country</label>
      <select id="signupCountry" class="form-control">

      </select>
    </div>

    <div class="form-group form-group-required arrange-fit">
      <label class="control-label" for="signupState">State or province</label>
      <select id="signupState"  class="form-control">
        <option selected="selected" value="">Select</option>
        <option value="1">Other</option>
        <option value="3">Alaska</option>
        <option value="4">Alabama</option>
        <option value="5">Arkansas</option>
        <option value="6">Arizona</option>

      </select>
    </div>
  </div>

  
    <div class="form-group form-group-required">
      <label class="control-label" for="signupPhone">Phone number</label>
      <input type="tel" class="form-control" id="signupPhone" data-mask-type="tel" data-country-select="#signupCountry"/>
    </div>
  
  
</form>

<script>
$(function() {
  var countryData     = $.fn.intlTelInput.getCountryData(),
  countryCount    = countryData.length,
  countryOptions  = [];

  for (i = 0; i < countryCount; i++) { // Build <option>s for country select(s)
    countryOptions.push($('<option></option>')
    .attr('value', countryData[i].iso2)
    .text(countryData[i].name)
  );
  }

  $('[data-mask-type="tel"]').each(function() { // Set up phone masking
    var $el         = $(this),
    countrySelector = $el.data('country-select'),
    $country        = $(countrySelector);

    $country.append(countryOptions).val('us');  // Add <option>s and set to 'us' by default
    $country.change(function() {
      $el.intlTelInput('selectCountry', $(this).val());
    });
  });
});
</script>

Payment Fields

Payment fields with behavioral input masks. input element data- attributes configure plugin.

  • Visa
  • MasterCard
  • Discover
  • American Express
  • Diner's Club

Sorry, that doesn't look like a valid credit card number.

Please enter a future expiration date in the format 'MM/YY'.

Sorry, that doesn't look like a valid CVV.

<div class="form-group form-group-required">
    <label class="control-label" for="signupCCName">Name on card</label>
    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="signupCCName" value="" >
  </div>
  <div class="form-group form-group-required knows-card" data-mask data-mask-type="CreditCard">
    <label class="control-label" for="signupCCNumber">Credit card number</label>
    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="signupCCNumber" name="signupCCNumber" placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" maxlength="19" />
    <ul class="list-unstyled u-margin-top">
      <li class="creditcard-visa"><span class="sr-only">Visa</span></li>
      <li class="creditcard-mastercard"><span class="sr-only">MasterCard</span></li>
      <li class="creditcard-discover"><span class="sr-only">Discover</span></li>
      <li class="creditcard-amex"><span class="sr-only">American Express</span></li>
      <li class="creditcard-dinersclub"><span class="sr-only">Diner's Club</span></li>
    </ul>
    <p class="help-block is-error-msg">Sorry, that doesn't look like a valid credit card number.</p>
  </div>
  <div class="form-group arrange arrange-equal arrange-gutter">
    <div class="form-group form-group-required arrange-fill" data-mask data-mask-type="ExpirationDate">
      <label class="control-label" for="signupCCExp">Expiration</label>
      <input type="text" class="form-control" id="signupCCExp" placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" maxlength="5" />
      <p class="help-block is-error-msg">Please enter a future expiration date in the format 'MM/YY'.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="form-group form-group-required form-group arrange-fill" data-mask data-mask-type="CVV" data-mask-cvv-for="signupCCNumber">
      <label class="control-label" for="signupCCCode">Security code</label>
      <div class="with-inset-creditcard">
        <input type="text" class="form-control" id="signupCCCode" pattern="[0-9]*" maxlength="5" />
        <span class="creditcard-cvv" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </div>
      <p class="help-block is-error-msg">Sorry, that doesn't look like a valid CVV.</p>
    </div>
  </div>
